commands.name: az containerapp logs show
commands.summary: Show past logs and/or print logs in real time (with the --follow parameter). Note that the logs are only taken from one revision, replica, and container (for non-system logs).
commands.syntax:
az containerapp logs show --name
                          --resource-group
                          [--container]
                          [--follow {false, true}]
                          [--format {json, text}]
                          [--replica]
                          [--revision]
                          [--tail]
                          [--type {console, system}]
examples: az containerapp logs show -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup
az containerapp logs show -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup --type system
az containerapp logs show -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup --follow --tail 30
az containerapp logs show -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup --replica MyReplica --revision MyRevision --container MyContainer
